caption.title: Structure and morphology of the CCNEs based on various substrates.
caption.p: Digital images and corresponding s.e.m. micrographs of the CCNEs based on the foil ( a, d, g), net ( b, e, h) and grid ( c, f, i) substrates, and corresponding 3D nano-architectural models ( j). Scale bars in a– c, 1 cm; scale bars in d– f, 10 um; scale bars in g– i, 1 um.
